title: OlympusDAO Partnership
body:
## Authors
Frax Finance Team

## Summary
Co-incentivize FRAX-OHM Uni pool with OlympusDAO and purchase OHM bonds with FRAX

## Background 
OlympusDAO manages OHM, a floating algorithmic currency which has gained traction as a non-pegged stablecoin. OlympusDAO currently uses DAI as their reserve asset, and are open to partnering with Frax to include FRAX as a reserve asset in an incentivized FRAX-OHM pool. The OlympusDAO community currently has an active vote detailing their proposal [here](https://scattershot.page/#/olympusdao.eth/proposal/QmRhBupfD53yBothJ6EarEiL6ztVjSPSfTHRWEpVE7oq3g).

## Purpose
The purpose of the OlympusDAO partnership is to foster cooperation between both communities as algorithmic stablecoins grow into defi as a whole.

The partnership would go as follows

## FRAX-OHM pair
Incentivize the FRAX-OHM pair on Uniswap with 2000 FXS/day.

## OHM Bond
Mint 500k FRAX through an AMO controller to be put in a $1m FRAX-OHM LP token bond, with the other half coming from OlympusDAO.

**If adopted**, this proposal seeks to:
1. Incentivize the FRAX-OHM pair with 2000 FXS/day
2. Purchase half of a $1m FRAX-OHM LP bond with OlympusDAO by minting 500k FRAX through an AMO controller

This **benefits Frax** as a whole by:
* Establishing a partnership with OlympusDAO
author: 0x234D953a9404Bf9DbC3b526271d440cD2870bCd2
